title: On the Women & Co. Blog: Hey Mom & Dad, Can I See Your Checkbook?
summary: In a new blog post, Women & Co.'s President & CEO Linda Descano discusses how you can open a dialogue with your parents about helping them organize their financial plans, wills, health care proxies, living wills, etc. and prepare for the future.
tag-1: On the Women & Co. Blog: Hey Mom & Dad, Can I See Your Checkbook?
